content: this legal case in croatia involves a coownership property specifically a multistory building with a groundlevel structure the case has been ongoing for 10 years and 8 months the final resolution states that one party identified as ik has been given exclusive possession and ownership of the northwestern part of the property which includes a residential unit on the ground floor and a portion of the yard on the upper floor the other party identified as jk has been given exclusive possession and ownership of the southeastern part of the property which includes a residential unit on the ground floor converted from commercial space and the eastern unit on the upper floor as well as the entrance hallway staircase and storage space the decision was made based on article 52 paragraph 1 of the property act
